text: Gratitude makes sense of our past, brings peace for today, and creates a vision for tomorrow.
author: Melody Beattie

text: Dear Lord we beg but one boon more: Peace in the hearts of all men living, peace in the whole world this Thanksgiving.
author: Joseph Auslander

text: Peace if possible, truth at all costs.
author: Martin Luther

text: In peace, sons bury their fathers. In war, fathers bury their sons.
author: Herodotus

text: We are not at peace with others because we are not at peace with ourselves, and we are not at peace with ourselves because we are not at peace with God.
author: Thomas Merton
